en.text:
What is it?

You can contact me (The Infinity's) here.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this page or questions about Scratch, GitHub, etc.

Also, I have a well-organized management system (there aren't that many people who send to contact), so your requests will almost certainly be granted. So please keep it coming!

Prohibited matters

・Things that put a load on the server such as spam

The data has probably arrived, so please refrain from sending it over and over again.

All of my websites are created for free, so there are limitations on bandwidth, etc.

・Slander, harassment, etc.

Block if there are too many.

Privacy policy

Received email addresses, user names, etc. will be strictly managed to prevent them from being leaked to outside parties.

Basically, we will not use it for any purpose other than replying, but we may occasionally ask you to review and test my page, so

I would be very happy if you could give me an answer.
